description:
Why not get a job at the local blacksmith, or maybe entertain fellow inmates and guards with a wonderful lute performance? See the sights of the castle and check out the throne room, you might even be rewarded for your exploits in the old halls.  

This medieval map comes with new items to find, craft and use in your efforts to escape this imposing fortress. It will be up to you to deliver yourself into salvation. Will you fight your way through the prison's fearsome guards? Or maybe find a more cunning way over the walls to freedom, but how will you cross the moat?

Do you have what it takes to escape Dungeons and Duct Tape?
name: The Escapists 2 - Dungeons and Duct Tape
